analysis: The documents in this cluster all relate to military and Coast Guard personnel, pay, benefits, and regulations. They cover topics such as suspension of work rules during national emergencies, amendments to the Uniform Code of Military Justice, transfer of Coast and Geodetic Survey officers to the Navy, suspension of employment restrictions in the Canal Zone, allowances for quarters and subsistence, incentive pay for aerial flights, increases in enlisted strength, authorization to order Ready Reserve to active duty, delegation of presidential authority to the Secretary of Defense, and clothing allowances. The sentiment is neutral, as these are official government documents.
title: Military and Coast Guard Personnel: Regulations, Pay, and Emergency Measures
